NPC_cindy.name: Rose
NPC_cindy.text: Not for too long. Just picking up whatever these shiny things scattered around might be.

Sign_tutorial.name: It's me, Mr. Signpost!
Sign_tutorial.text: Wowee! You did it! You clicked on a signpost! I'm so proud of you~

Sign_ladder.name: It's me, Mr. Signpost again...
Sign_ladder.text: Golly, you sure are good at climbing ladders!

Trash.name: Trashbag
Trash.text: It's a literal trashbag. Why are you looking at this?

Sign_1.name: Slime Pit Sign
Sign_1.text: Welcome to the slime pit. Please do not stomp on our precious slimes.
